error.title: Delivery Not Found
error.message: The specified delivery ID was not found in the system.

details.message: The delivery ID 'DEL98765' does not exist.

error.title: Missing Recipient Address
error.message: The recipient address is required for delivery.

details.message: The recipient address is missing or incomplete.

error.title: Delivery Location Closed
error.message: The delivery location is closed at the specified time.

details.message: Delivery cannot be made at this time as the location is closed.
